alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Baldwin County through 245 PM EDT... At 211 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorms were centered near Milledgeville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Midway-Hardwick, Coopers, Underwood, Hardwick, Browns Crossing, Allenwood, Pancras and Scottsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
